title: Deportees — Under the pavement - the beach record cover?
content:
Hi.  
Anyone know which font Deportees use on their cover for Under the pavement — the beach, album?

Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 8.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021918/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%208_17.png) | 74.28 KB |
author: 1UP

comments.content: [Agincourt](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021918/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/david-quay/agincourt/?testdrive=custom%3D0%26seed%3D28%26dock%3D0%26size%3D93%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DDeportees%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dot.liga) with a touch of vertical and horizontal scale on the “D”.

Thank you very much.  
Appreciate it.
